Subsection.Text: The department shall, in accordance with rules set by the board, assess and collect the following fees:

Paragraph.Text: A fee not to exceed $300 for each application for licensure as a state pilot or certification as a deputy pilot. This fee shall be nonrefundable.
A fee not to exceed $300 for each examination for licensure as a state pilot or certification as a deputy pilot.
A fee not to exceed $300 for each examination review.

Subsection.Text: The department shall assess and collect biennially from each licensed state pilot and each certificated deputy pilot a fee, not to exceed $200 in the case of a licensed state pilot or $100 in the case of a certificated deputy pilot, such fees to be set by the board.
